content: Getting an error on this LOINC code 90252-8 (The code "90252-8" is not valid in the system http://loinc.org; The code provided (http://loinc.org#90252-8) is not valid in the value set All codes known to the system). It's been around for a while (created for HAI) but still marked as Trial (https://s.details.loinc.org/LOINC/90252-8.html?sections=Comprehensive )

I also get an error on SNOMED code: unable to find code 765107002 in http://snomed.info/sct. Also definitely there in SNOMED: https://browser.ihtsdotools.org/?perspective=full&conceptId1=765107002&edition=us-edition&release=v20190301&server=https://prod-browser-exten.ihtsdotools.org/api/snomed/&langRefset=900000000000509007 - it was new a few months ago, but it's definitely in the latest release.

I think the SNOMED one is actually causing 3 errors in my IG:

QuestionnaireResponse/hai-questionnaireResponse-los-event: QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer    error   The value provided (http://snomed.info/sct::765107002) is not in the options value set in the questionnaire
QuestionnaireResponse/hai-questionnaireResponse-los-event: QuestionnaireResponse.item   error   Item has answer, even though it is not enabled los-contributed-to-death
QuestionnaireResponse/hai-questionnaireResponse-los-event: QuestionnaireResponse.item[3].answer.valueCoding error   unable to find code 765107002 in http://snomed.info/sct

All because it's choking on that one code.

And this LOINC code: The code "89875-9" is not valid in the system http://loinc.org; The code provided (http://loinc.org#89875-9) is not valid in the value set All codes known to the system

Also definitely there (and not trial or new or anything): https://s.details.loinc.org/LOINC/89875-9.html?sections=Comprehensive
89875-9 doesn't seem to be in the LOINC table in the latest LOINC release sources
It's definitely there in the latest LOINC 2.65 table.

So @Rob Hausam the code is there, it's just the FHIR terminology server that is not finding it?

I had the same issue back in Sept when I was trying to publish. That was with the snomed code above (which still isnt' working) and now these 2 LOINC codes. I guess I'll tell @Grahame Grieve and hope that this is a "tooling error" so I can go to ballot....
I haven't upgraded the server to 2.65 yet.
Ok, well, I'll not worry about the code errors I guess...
Hmm, looks like I haven't upgraded to 2.65 yet either. Will get to it in the next week.
I just upgraded the server to 2.65 for LOINC
Yeah - I couldn't figure out why I was magically one error down!! Thanks!

I'm still getting an error on SNOMED 765107002 - any chance of an update there? https://browser.ihtsdotools.org/?perspective=full&conceptId1=765107002&edition=us-edition&release=v20190301&server=https://prod-browser-exten.ihtsdotools.org/api/snomed/&langRefset=900000000000509007

That's my second last error....
